entry.tran: (虽常事与愿违但)出于好心的，善意的，本意良好的
entry.def: If you say that a person or their actions are well-meaning, you mean that they intend to be helpful or kind but they are unsuccessful or cause problems.

"the exasperation of a...well-meaning cow worried by dogs"

means.word_mean: 2. marked by good intentions though often producing unfortunate results;
